description: Main source file for the Flutter-based bookstore frontend, defining live UI components, theme, navigation, and state management classes.

classes.name: AppColors
classes.description: Defines the Ocean Professional color palette used throughout the app.

classes.name: Book
classes.description: Represents a book with all relevant properties.

classes.name: CartItem
classes.description: Models an item in the shopping cart, including book reference and quantity.

classes.name: MockBookRepository
classes.description: Mocks data source for books, categories, and search functionality.

classes.name: CatalogState
classes.description: State management for catalog search, filter, and sort.

classes.name: CartState
classes.description: State management for shopping cart, including add, remove, and quantity adjustments.

classes.name: BookStoreApp
classes.description: Root widget configuring providers and theme for the app.

classes.name: RootNav
classes.description: Bottom navigation bar managing main app screens.

classes.name: GradientHeader
classes.description: Reusable header with gradient background and preferred size.

classes.name: HomePage
classes.description: Displays featured books carousel and hero banner.

classes.name: CatalogPage
classes.description: Main browsing page with search, filter, and sort.

classes.name: CartPage
classes.description: Displays items added to cart, total, and checkout button.

classes.name: ProfilePage
classes.description: User profile page with profile info and options.

classes.name: BookCard
classes.description: Widget to display a book in grid or list with image, title, author, rating, and price.

classes.name: BookDetailPage
classes.description: Detailed view of a single book with cover, description, and add to cart.

classes.name: CheckoutPage
classes.description: Mock checkout form with shipping, payment, summary, and confirmation.
